newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Austereo says behind budget target.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Austereo says behind budget target.

text.p: Austereo Ltd said on Tuesday it was behind budget targets for 1996/97 but on track with last year's strong results, which saw a 95 percent rise in net profit to A$36.4 million.

"While we are currently behind our budget we are certainly on par with last year's excellent results which you may remember was some 95 percent ahead of the previous year," chairman John Kirby told shareholders at the annual meeting.
Kirby said radio revenue from capital city operations in the month of September was about 11 percent behind last year but both October and November had shown early signs of indusry revenue growth.
"We are in a sound November position both financially and strategically to benefit pretty strongly when the storm passes."
